mapper.sql: act.id, act.member_id, act.school_organization_id, act.title, act.created_time, act.expired_time, act.likes, act.school_activity_category_id, act.content
mapper.select:
select
from school_activity act INNER JOIN member mem ON mem.id = act.member_id INNER JOIN school_activity_category cate ON cate.id = act.school_activity_category_id where act.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

likes,

mapper.update:
update school_activity
member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
school_organization_id = #{schoolOrganizationId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=DATE},
expired_time = #{expiredTime,jdbcType=DATE},
likes = #{likes,jdbcType=INTEGER},
school_activity_category_id = #{schoolActivityCategoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
